section.title: BREADCRUMB
section.p: Displays the path to the current tab in the format (> is the default separator). Example: PageName1 > PageName2 > PageName3

section.title: COPYRIGHT
section.p: Displays the copyright notice for the website.

section.title: CURRENTDATE
section.p: Displays the current date on the server.

section.title: DOTNETNUKE
section.p: Displays the copyright notice for DotNetNuke. (optional)

section.title: HELP
section.p: Displays a Help link, which sends email to the website's administrator, using the user's default email client.

section.title: HOSTNAME
section.p: Displays the host title linked to the host URL.

section.title: LANGUAGE
section.p: Displays the language selector dropdown list or the language flags.

section.title: LINKS
section.p: Displays a flat menu of links associated with the current tab level and the parent node.

section.title: LOGIN
section.p: Displays “Login” for anonymous users and “Logout” for authenticated users.

section.title: NAV
section.p: Displays a menu, according to the type specified in the ProviderName attribute.

section.title: PRIVACY
section.p: Displays a link to the Privacy Information page for the website.

section.title: STYLES
section.p: Allows you to add Internet Explorer-specific stylesheets to your theme.

section.title: TERMS
section.p: Displays a link to the Terms and Conditions page of the website.

section.title: TEXT
section.p: Displays localized text in your theme and supports the use of token replacement.

section.title: TREEVIEW
section.p: Displays a menu, similar to the Windows Explorer menu, using the DNN Treeview Control.

section.title: USER
section.p: Displays a “Register” link for anonymous users or the user's name for authenticated users.
